TopicTitle: mun biomes: where is farside basin

Articles.Content:
i was trying to visit all mun biomes, where i discovered some discrepancies on my sources.

the wiki says there are 17 biomes. however, the map included in the page only lists 15. and after many orbits, i found 16.

to complicate matters, my game is in italian, and while some names have obvious correspondences, some are not clear.

the map is missing farside basin and lowlands. i am fairly sure i got the lowlands. i am missing farside basin.

so, can anyone point where is it? thanks

4 hours ago, king of nowhere said:

so, can anyone point where is it? thanks

Certainly:

It is the light pink area to the northeast of East Farside Crater, northwest of Farside Crater (no, I don't know why East Farside Crater is west of Farside Crater) southwest of Polar Crater, and due west of the north-south Canyons.  I can verify its existence; I just drove a rover there from the east-west Canyons a few days ago.

Edited July 4, 2020 by Zhetaan
